sections.heading: Partition
sections.text:
authorized even though portion of original share previously assigned or

conveyed to others.

sections.heading: Contents
sections.text: of petition; contents and service of citation.

sections.heading: Appointment
sections.text: of guardians and attorneys before partition.

sections.heading: Commissioners
sections.text: for partition: Appointment; warrant; oath; qualifications.

sections.heading: Commissioners
sections.text: may be appointed for each county if real property in different counties.

sections.heading: Shares
sections.text: set out in proportion to rights; common or undivided shares.

sections.heading: Procedure
sections.text: when value of property to be divided greater than share of one party.

sections.heading: Sale
sections.text: of property when it cannot be divided fairly: Rules of sale.

sections.heading: Severance
sections.text:
of common and undivided real property held by heirs or devisees and another

person: Procedure.

sections.heading: Commissioners
sections.text: may set off quality against quantity to make shares of equal value.

sections.heading: Report
sections.text:
of commissioners; objections to report; hearing on objections; order of

confirmation.

sections.heading: Effect
sections.text: of allotment by court: When appealable.
